SEARCH
Package org.biopax.validator.utils

Class CoreUtils

java.lang.Object
org.biopax.validator.utils.CoreUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidatorUtils
@Configurable public class CoreUtils extends Object implements ValidatorUtils
Validation rules and errors utilities. This is injected into other beans, keeps several global settings and objects, e.g., marshaller, and also provides static service methods to register, merge, do OXM, and resolve validation errors to human-readable verbose messages.
Author:
rodche

      Description copied from interface: ValidatorUtils
      Creates an error type with single error case.
      Specified by:
      createError in interface ValidatorUtils
      Parameters:
      objectName - name of the problematic model object
      errorCode - validator error code
      ruleName - validation rule name
      profile - validation profile
      isFixed - true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
      msgArgs - error message details
      Returns:
      error type obj.
